Text: I'd like to apologize for starting this.  Upping torrents is personal for me and I over reacted to this situation.  My apoligize to Ichiroyoung.  He does good work.  And he sees fit to use some of my work I should see it as a compliment.  I hope this ends this particular situation.  Thanks for listening/reading.

Username: regardless of who scanned the shit... Ichiro
Date: if you ARE downloading this guy's stuff to use in your torrents
column5: but give credit where it's due... OR DICKWING WILL RULE YOU!!!"
